inclusion.criterion: Patient being prescribed broad spectrum antibiotics for a minimum period of 7 days and a maximum period of 10 days.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Broad spectrum antibiotics are aminopenicillins (amoxicillin with or without clavulanic acid, ampicillin)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient who the investigator believes that they can and will comply with the requirements of the protocol.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject having a central venous catheter
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has V. cholerae in stool, but no fever or blood in stool.
